body.p: These technotes are only a supplement to the official Gentoo documentation. Read the Gentoo Handbook for more generic information about Gentoo installation.
The Gentoo/AMD64 project currently has mailing lists and forums available for users to ask questions.

ul.li: Mailing List: Subscribe / Unsubscribe / Mailing List Overview

body.p: If you've read all the documentation and still haven't found the answer to your question, then the best choice is to ask about your problem on the #gentoo-amd64 IRC channel on irc.freenode.net.
body.note: It is very important that you read these technotes first before asking questions in the forums, mailing lists or IRC.

body.p: The AMD64 Homepage has important information about porting applications to the AMD64 platform that may be useful if you are interested in writing patches to fix broken ebuilds.
